# Sample Stellaris Technology File - Society
# This is an example for testing purposes

tech_colonization_1 = {
	cost = 0
	area = society
	tier = 0
	start_tech = yes
	category = { new_worlds }

	weight = 100
}

tech_gene_banks = {
	cost = 1500
	area = society
	tier = 1
	category = { biology }
	prerequisites = { "tech_colonization_1" }
	weight = 80
}

tech_gene_expressions = {
	cost = 3000
	area = society
	tier = 2
	category = { biology }
	prerequisites = { "tech_gene_banks" }
	weight = 70
}

tech_genetic_engineering = {
	cost = 6000
	area = society
	tier = 3
	category = { biology }
	prerequisites = { "tech_gene_expressions" }
	weight = 60
}

tech_synthetic_leaders = {
	cost = 10000
	area = society
	tier = 4
	is_rare = yes
	category = { biology }
	prerequisites = { "tech_genetic_engineering" }
	weight = 25
}
